content:
Michael J. Carey

Department of Computer Science
Bren School of Information and Computer Sciences
University of California, Irvine

  • PROFESSIONAL INTERESTS

  • EDUCATION

  • PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

  • PUBLICATIONS

  • PROFESSIONAL ACTIVITIES

  • GRADUATE THESES SUPERVISED

  • RESEARCH FUNDING

  • HONORS and AWARDS

  • PATENTS

  • INVITED LECTURES and PANELS

  • CONTACT

Professional Activities

Offices Held

  • Secretary/Treasurer, ACM Special Interest Group on Management of Data (SIGMOD), 1989-1997.
  • Trustee, VLDB Endowment, 1996-2002.
  • Technical Advisory Board Member, FLOWR Foundation, 2006-2010.
  • Trustee, VLDB Endowment, 2010-2019.
  • ACM SIGMOD Advisory Board Member, 2011-2013.
  • Treasurer, VLDB Endowment, 2011-2019.
  • Advisory Board Member, Professor Ram Kumar Memorial Foundation, 2015-present.

External Committees

  • Member, NRC Committee on the Social Security Administration’s E-Government Strategy and Planning for the Future, 2006-2007.
  • Member, ACM SIGMOD Awards Committee, 2006-2008.
  • Chair, ACM SIGMOD Awards Committee, 2007.
  • Member, Steering Committee, NSF Information, Integration, and Informatics Workshop, 2010.
  • Member, IEEE Data Engineering Awards Committee, 2007-2012.
  • Member, Advisory Board, French National R&D Project CODEX, 2010-2012.
  • Member, Advisory Board, MIT/Intel Science and Technology Center for Big Data, 2012-2016.
  • Member, ACM SoCC Steering Committee, 2012-present.
  • Chair, VLDB Awards Committee, 2013.
  • Member, Int’l. Advisory Committee, Institute for Data Science and Eng., ECNU, 2013-present.
  • Chair, IEEE Transactions on Big Data EIC Search Committee, 2014.
  • Member, VLDB 2016 Advisory Council, 2014-2016.
  • Member, ACM SIGMOD Systems Award Committee, 2014-present.
  • Faculty Leader, UC Institute for Prediction Technology, 2015-present.
  • Member, External Advisory Board, San Diego Supercomputer Center, 2015-present.
  • Member, ACM A.M. Turing Award Committee, 2016-present.
  • Member, IEEE TCDE Awards Committee, 2017-present.
  • Member, ACM SIGMOD Awards Committee, 2018-present.

Journal/Book Editing

  • Associate Editor, IEEE Database Engineering Bulletin, 1987-1990.
  • Editorial Board, VLDB Journal, 1996-2003.
  • Associate Editor, ACM Trans. on Database Systems, 1992-2004.
  • Special Issue Editor IEEE Data Engineering Bulletin, December 2008.
  • Co-Editor-in-Chief, Data-Centric Systems and Applications series, Springer-Verlag, 2002-present.
  • Editorial Board, Foundations and Trends in Databases, Now Publishers, 2009-2019.
  • Member, Advisory Board, Data Science and Engineering, Springer Open, 2014-present.

Conference General Chairing
General Chair for 2015 VLDB Conf.

Conference Program Committee Chairing
Program Co-Chair for 1993 PDIS Conf., Industrial Program Co-Chair for 1994 ACM SIGMOD Conf., Program Chair for 1995 ACM SIGMOD Conf., Americas Program Chair for 1997 VLDB Conf., Industrial Program Chair for 2002 ACM SIGMOD Conf., Infrastructure Program Chair for 2003 VLDB Conf., Co-Chair for 2006 XIME-P Workshop, Industrial Applications and Experience Program Co-chair for 2009 VLDB Conf., Industry Track Co-Chair for 2010 ICDE Conf., Program Chair for 2011 HPTS Symposium, Program Co-Chair for 2012 ACM Symp. on Cloud Computing (SoCC).

Other Conference Chairing:
Research Prototype Exhibits Chair for 1988 ACM SIGMOD Conf., Tutorial Chair for 1993 VLDB Conf., Panel Chair for 1993 ACM SIGMOD Conf., Co-Organizer of 1998 NSF Workshop on Academic/Industrial Cooperation in Database Systems, Panel Chair for 2000 ICDE Conf., Tutorial Co-Chair for 2005 ICDE Conf., Panel Co-Chair for 2006 VLDB Conf., Seminars Co-Chair for 2008 ICDE Conf., Sponsorship Chair for 2010 ACM SIGMOD Conf., Sponsorship Co-Chair for 2011 ACM SIGMOD Conf., Award Committee Chair for 2013 VLDB Conf., Sponsorship Co-Chair for 2014 VLDB Conf., Sponsorship Co-Chair for 2016 VLDB Conf., Sponsorship Co-Chair for 2017 VLDB Conf.Sponsorship Co-Chair for 2018 VLDB Conf., Tutorials Co-Chair for 2020 VLDB Conf.

Conference and Workshop Program Committees:
1985 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 1987 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 1988 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 1988 VLDB Conf., 1989 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 1989 VLDB Conf., 1989 Conf. on Data and Knowledge Sys. For Manuf. and Eng., 1990 ACM SIGMETRICS Conf., 1990 VLDB Conf., 1991 VLDB Conf., 1991 Conf. on Parallel and Dist. Info. Sys., 1992 IEEE Workshop on Rsch. Issues on Data Eng.: Trans. and Query Proc., 1992 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 1992 IEEE Workshop on Mgmt. of Replicated Data, 1994 Conf. on Extending Database Technology, 1994 VLDB Conf., 1996 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 1999 VLDB Conf., 2000 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 2000 COMAD Conf, 2002 VLDB Conf., 2003 Conf. on Innovative Data Systems Research (CIDR), 2003 ACM SIGMOD Conf. (Industrial Track), 2004 VLDB Conf. (Core Committee), 2005 Conf. on Innovative Data Systems Research (CIDR), 2005 IEEE Int’l. Conf. on Web Services (ICWS). 2006 ACM SIGMOD Conf., 2006 ICDE Conf. (Industrial Track), 2007 ICDE Conf. (Industrial Track), 2007 ACM SIGMOD Conf. (Industrial Track), 2007 VLDB Conf. (Infrastructure for Information Systems Track), 2008 VLDB Conf. (Industrial Track), 2008 Int’l. Workshop on Business Intelligence for the Real-Time Enterprise (BIRTE 08), 2008 Int’l. Conf. on Service-Oriented Computing (Tool Demonstration Track), 2009 ICDE Conf. (Industrial Track), 2009 WWW Conf. (Structured and Unstructured Data Track), 2009 Int’l. Workshop on Information & Software as a Service (WISS 10), 2010 ACM SoCC Conf., 2010 VLDB Conf. (Infrastructure for Information Systems Track), 2010 ACM/IFIP/USENIX Middleware Conf. (Industrial Track), 2011 CIDR Conf., 2011 ACM SoCC Conf., 2012 VLDB Conf. (Experiments & Analysis Track), 2012 EDBT/ICDT Conf. (Industrial Track), 2013 IEEE Conf. on Cloud Engineering (IC2E), 2013 EDBT/ICDT Conf. (Industrial Track), 2013 CIKM Workshop on Data Management & Analytics for Healthcare, 2014 EDBT/ICDT Workshop on Algorithms for MapReduce and Beyond, 2014 IEEE Workshop on Data Management in the Cloud, 2014 IIWeb Workshop, 2014 ICDCS Conf., 2014 ICDE Conf., 2015 EDBT Conf., 2016 ACM SIGMOD Conf. (Demo Track), 2016 XLDB Symp. (Organizing Committee), 2016 SIGMOD/PODS Ph.D. Symposium Workshop, 2016 IEEE BigData Conf., 2017 IEEE BigData Conf. (Senior PC Member), 2019 XLDB Symp. (Organizing Committee), 2019 VLDB Conf. (Industrial Track).

Journal Refereeing:
The VLDB Journal, ACM Trans. on Database Systems, Comm. of the ACM, ACM Trans. on Computer Systems, ACM Trans. on Information Systems, ACM Trans. on Software Engineering Methodology, ACM Computing Surveys, IEEE Trans. on Knowledge and Data Engineering, IEEE Trans. on Parallel and Dist. Systems, IEEE Trans. on Software Engineering, IEEE Computer, IEEE Trans. on Computers, Proc. of the IEEE, Dist. and Parallel Database Systems Journal, Information Systems, Software-Practice & Experience, Information Processing Letters, Computer Networks, Preventive Medicine, Foundations and Trends in Database Systems.

Other Conference Refereeing:
1984 VLDB Conf., 1985 IEEE Parallel Processing Conf., 1986 Fall Joint Computer Conf., 1986 VLDB Conf., 1988 Conf. on Data and Knowledge Bases, 1987 EDBT Conf., 1989 Conf. on Manufacturing Data and Knowledge Management, 1990 Parbase Conf., 1990 ACM PODS Conf., 1991 ACM SIGMETRICS Conf., 1992 Data Eng. Conf., 1992 VLDB Conf., 1993 Data Eng. Conf., 1993 SIGMOD Conf.

Proposal Reviewing:
National Science Foundation, California MICRO Program, Australian National Research Council, IBM Corporation, Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC).

Society Memberships:
ACM (SIGMOD), IEEE (Computer Society), Eta Kappa Nu, Tau Beta Pi.
